Earlier this year, we launched our Group’s 70th anniversary celebrations and invited our team members, partners, and customers to be part of #MyFutureNote - a campaign that unites us to shape the future, one note at a time.

Join #MyFutureNote on One Chalhoub <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1533&user=10620> :
- Download the templates here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1532&user=10620> 
- Write your Future Note for tomorrow under one of the 4 main key areas: Innovation, Sustainability, Collaboration, Culture
- Post your note on One Chalhoub using the hashtags #MyFutureNote #SymphonyOfTheFuture tagging Nadiem Karas <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1534&user=10620> 
- Mention 2 friends and/or colleagues to participate

Let’s compose our Symphony of the Future together!

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/4e142091dca53e5e081c003f1dab2dbf938269719.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1535&user=10620>

We’ll be selecting 3 winners to receive exciting prizes sponsored by FACES!

Business Continuity Management

As part of our BCM initiative with PwC, we hosted two awareness sessions to help our Group prepare for the unexpected.

The sessions covered what Business Continuity means, how disruptions can affect our work, and the role each of us plays in recovery, plus real-life scenarios and simple actions to take.
Missed it? Watch the session now <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1539&user=10620> .
